dialog:
WELCOME TO
THIS SANCTUARY.
YOUR WOUNDS WILL
HEAL HERE.

SIMON, THE
CHURCH OFFERS
REFUGE. REST TO
REGAIN STRENGTH.

THE CURSE IS
HARD ON YOU.
MAY NIGHT
GUIDE YOU SAFELY.

THESE MONSTERS
ATTACK OUR
VILLAGE DAILY
BE CAREFUL.

REST HERE TO
HEAL, BELMONT.
MAY GOD BE
WITH YOU ALWAYS.

YOUR FAMILY
FACES DARKNESS.
WE PRAY TO
END THIS CURSE.

EVENING BRINGS
DEMONS. USE THE
CHURCH FOR
SAFETY AT NIGHT.

OUR VILLAGERS
SUFFER MUCH.
MONSTERS ARE
RELENTLESS HERE.

THIS CHURCH
WEEPS FOR THE
BELMONT'S PAIN.
HEAL WITH US.

MAY YOUR
JOURNEY BE
BLEST. RETURN
SOON TO HEAL.

BUY MY
WHITE CRYSTAL.

THIS CRYSTAL
CAN GUIDE YOU.

THE WHITE
CRYSTAL IS
MAGICAL.

WITH THIS
CRYSTAL, FIND
SECRET PATHS.

A RARE GEM,
THIS WILL HELP.

SEEKING POWER?
BUY THIS.

THE CRYSTAL
REVEALS HIDDEN.

WHITE CRYSTAL,
WORTH EVERY
GOLD.

POSSESS IT,
UNVEIL MYSTERIES.

ONLY THIS
CRYSTAL CAN
SHOW THE WAY.

HOLY WATER
FOR YOUR QUEST.

ONLY THE PURE
SHALL WIELD THIS.

IT WILL HELP
YOUR JOURNEY.

TRUST IN ME,
THIS WILL AID.

FIGHT EVIL
WITH HOLY WATER.

A WEAPON FOR
THE RIGHTEOUS.

BUY THIS TO
CLEANSE YOUR PATH.

ESSENTIAL FOR
VAMPIRE SLAYING.

HAVE FAITH IN
HOLY WATER.

BELIEVE IN THE
POWER IT HOLDS.

BUY THE
WHITE
CRYSTAL
IN THIS
TOWN.

THE WHITE
CRYSTAL
CAN REVEAL
HIDDEN
THINGS.

THE CURSE
IS SLOWLY
CONSUMING
OUR LAND.

I HAVE LIVED
HERE FOR
OVER SIXTY
YEARS.

YOU ARE NOT
WELCOME
HERE,
BELMONT!

THE BELMONT
FAMILY HELP,
BUT BROUGHT
THIS CURSE.

THE WHITE
CRYSTAL
SHOWS
WHAT WAS
VEILED.

THE CURSE
HAS MADE
OUR LIVES
A NIGHTMARE.

I REMEMBER
WHEN THIS
TOWN WAS
PROSPEROUS.

YOUR ARRIVAL
BRINGS MORE
TROUBLE,
BELMONT.

HOLY WATER
HAS MAGIC
PROPERTIES,
DEFEATING
EVIL MONSTERS.

EVIL FEARS
HOLY WATER.
USE IT TO
DEFEAT
MONSTERS.

HOLY WATER
REVEALS AND
DESTROYS
ILLUSIONS.
TRUST ME.

IN THIS TOWN,
YOU CAN BUY
HOLY WATER.
STOCK UP.

MONSTERS DREAD
HOLY WATER.
USE IT TO
YOUR ADVANTAGE.

TAKE HOLY
WATER WITH
YOU. IT WILL
AID YOUR
QUEST.

BEWARE THE
ILLUSIONS.
HOLY WATER
UNCOVERS
TRUTH.

EVIL MAGIC
IS SHATTERED
BY HOLY
WATER'S
PURIFYING POWER.

MONSTERS CANNOT
WITHSTAND THE
POWER OF
HOLY WATER.

IN MY YOUTH,
HOLY WATER
SAVED MANY
FROM EVIL
FORCES.

DO NOT TRUST
THE VILLAGERS.
MANY ARE
WITH DRACULA.

THE PRIEST
AT CHURCH
IS A SPY FOR
DRACULA.

OUR MAYOR IS
INSANE! HE
CLAIMS TO
SEE DRACULA.

THE BAKER
SLIPS POISON
INTO HIS
BREAD FOR
DRACULA.

EVEN THE
LIVESTOCK
WHISPER
ABOUT
BLOODLUST.

SOMETHING IS
WRONG WITH
THE BLACKSMITH.
HE SMILES
TOO MUCH.

THEY LAUGH
WHEN YOU'RE
GONE. THEY
WATCH YOU.

SECRETS LURK
IN EVERY
CORNER. EVEN
CHILDREN ARE
INVOLVED.

DRACULA'S
POWER DRIVES
THEM CRAZY.
STAY ALERT.

THE TAVERN
OWNER OFFERS
DRINKS WITH
DRACULA'S
TOUCH.

THE 13 CLUES
OF DRACULA
ARE HIDDEN IN
WALLS EVERY-
WHERE.

FIND THE CLUES,
SIMON. THEY
WILL GUIDE
YOU TO DEFEAT
DRACULA.

EACH BOOK
HOLDS‚Å† SECRETS
TO WIN THE
FINAL BATTLE.

DRACULA'S
SECRETS
ARE SCATTERED
ACROSS THE
LAND.

SMASH WALLS
TO UNEARTH
THESE VITAL
BOOKS.

13 CLUES TO
DEFEAT
DRACULA ARE
YOUR ONLY
HOPE.

THESE BOOKS
HOLD ANCIENT
KNOWLEDGE TO
AID YOU.

SEARCH DEEP
IN WALLS TO
FIND THE LOST
CLUES.

YOU MUST
LOCATE ALL
13 TO BEAT
THE DARK
LORD.

DRACULA'S
DEFEAT LIES
WITHIN THESE
HIDDEN TEXTS.

IN THE TOWN
OF ALDRA,
YOU WILL
FIND ONE WHO
HUNTS DARKNESS.

THIS HUNTER
BELONGS TO
A GUILD OF
NIGHT WARRIORS.

SEEK OUT THE
TAVERN IN
ALDRA, HE
MAY BE THERE.

THE KEY TO
YOUR QUEST
LIES WITH
THIS
MYSTERIOUS MAN.

HE SEARCHES
FOR AN
ANCIENT
MAGIC ITEM.

WHEN YOU
FIND HIM,
YOUR PATH
WILL BECOME
CLEARER.

THE GUILD
PROTECTS
SECRETS OF
THE SUPERNATURAL.

HE MAY BE
LOOKING FOR
A LEGENDARY
ARTIFACT.

THE MEMBER
OF THE GUILD
KNOWS THE OLD
LEGENDS WELL.

HE WILL
RECOGNIZE
YOUR PURPOSE,
SEEK HIM
OUT.
